attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current status of this government is untenable, suffering significant ministerial regignations,and as a result we are being governed by numbers of unelected people such as Mandelson and Kinnock. Losing the local government elections so badly is the last straw. Let the people decide

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
